member.name: DWRITE_FONT_AXIS_TAG
member.summary: Defines constants that specify a four-character identifier for a font axis.

member.name: DWRITE_FONT_AXIS_TAG.DWRITE_FONT_AXIS_TAG_WEIGHT
member.summary: Specifies the weight axis, using the identifier 'w','g','h','t'.

member.name: DWRITE_FONT_AXIS_TAG.DWRITE_FONT_AXIS_TAG_WIDTH
member.summary: Specifies the width axis, using the identifier 'w','d','t','h'.

member.name: DWRITE_FONT_AXIS_TAG.DWRITE_FONT_AXIS_TAG_SLANT
member.summary: Specifies the slant axis, using the identifier 's','l','n','t'.

member.name: DWRITE_FONT_AXIS_TAG.DWRITE_FONT_AXIS_TAG_OPTICAL_SIZE
member.summary: Specifies the optical size axis, using the identifier 'o','p','s','z'.

member.name: DWRITE_FONT_AXIS_TAG.DWRITE_FONT_AXIS_TAG_ITALIC
member.summary: Specifies the italic axis, using the identifier 'i','t','a','l'.
